metadata.title: CVE-2023-27530 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A DoS vulnerability exists in Rack <v3.0.4.2, <v2.2.6.3, <v2.1.4.3 and <v2.0.9.3 within in the Multipart MIME parsing code in which could allow an attacker to craft requests that can be abuse to cause multipart parsing to take longer than expected.

notes.note: iconstantin> Intrusive backport for older releases.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
